version_description:
1. Shorter Recording Times!
2. Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/superpowerfx
3. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

iOS11 compatible!
New Super Powers! Sorry for the wait!
1) Cosmic Drill - Summon the power Cosmic to blast your enemies!
2) Superspeed - Run at LIGHTNING speed to make a dramatic entrance (or exit!)
3) Vanish - Disappear into a plume of crows or flower petals!
4) Quantum Burst - Power up this green orb to shove into your foe's face!
5) Shriek - Scream loud! This will destroy all enemies (and glass) in your way.
6) Tornado - Summon the elements of wind to hurl your enemies away!

We are currently working on even more super powers! Including an ability to animorph! Stay tuned!

Major Upgrades:
1. "Telekinesis" added to super powers! Toss a car at your friends!
2. "Summons" added to super powers! Bring meteors down on your buddies!

Minor Upgrades:
1. Updated saving dialogues for clearer explanations.
2. Updated Facebook API
3. iOS9 compatible
4. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Found a bug? E-mail me at joe@superpowerfx.com and tell me the following:
1) iPhone version (5/5S/6/6+/6S/6S+)
2) iOS version (6.0/7.0/8.0/9.0)
3) Steps to make the crash happen.

Publishers, Advertisers and Business Development can reach me at joe@superpowerfx.com

Major Upgrades
1) New GODS pack! This contains 5 explosive new super powers with godly abilities!
2) New ANIMORPHS pack! Transform into any of 5 carnivorous beasts!
3) Added SHAKING effects to all super powers with destructive power! Explore your old super powers and see the results!

If you have any bugs or business questions, please send to joe@superpowerfx.com
Upgraded components for sharing to social networks

1. Supports iPhone 12 hardware
2. Adjusted the UI for cleaner fit
3. Repositioned Animorphs effects to look correct
